item.description:
Introducing The Lounge At Sake, a sleek little upscale lounge in the rear of the popular Japanese-food joint, Sake Portsmouth just now opened in time for your Summer fling awakening in Portsmouth.

Join the Cocktail Meetup roup for cocktails and a sake powered dance party on Friday July 30th starting at 9 pm.The party features music by DJ Flex and plenty of cocktail specials. If you missed the Portsmouth Cocktail Competition you might want to try the Yoko Ono Martini from the event.

Never a Cover

Full Menu served during Dance Party!

Leave the decks on Friday night and come join us at the Sake Powered Party in Portsmouth on Friday July 30th! Don't forget to bring your Poken and network at night!
item.name: Cocktailing at Sake Portsmouth
